com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.instrument

Interface CpTransformer


  • public interface CpTransformer
    Transformer access for entries in the constant pool
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    AgentTroll

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConstantRef transform(ConstantRef ref)
      Allows the constant pool entry to be modified
      ConstantRef transform(Instrument instrument, ConstantRef ref)
      Allows the constant pool entry to be modified
      PoolRef transform(PoolRef ref)
      Allows the constant pool as a whole to be modified

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        ConstantRef transform(Instrument instrument,
                      ConstantRef ref)
        Allows the constant pool entry to be modified
        Parameters:
        ref - the current reference of the constant the iteration is on - this will be called for each entry in the constant pool
        Returns:
        the transformed constant, or the same constant if not changed. null to remove.

      • transform

        ConstantRef transform(ConstantRef ref)
        Allows the constant pool entry to be modified
        Parameters:
        ref - the current reference of the constant the iteration is on - this will be called for each entry in the constant pool
        Returns:
        the transformed constant, or the same constant if not changed. null to remove.

      • transform

        PoolRef transform(PoolRef ref)
        Allows the constant pool as a whole to be modified
        Parameters:
        ref - the reference to the constant pool
        Returns:
        the transformed constant pool
